text: @rsprasad @narendramodi @PMOIndia @MoHFW_INDIA @DDNewslive @HMOIndia @BJP4India @BJP4Bihar Sir, think about home buyer, who did not get home. Project stopped and builder absconded. Banks filed case for recovery. Salary cut. We die to pay day by day by facing illogical legal battle. Not hoping to refund hard earned money. We better dye of covid19. Don't want home.
